name: Mbomba (Mbamba)
shortLoreBlurb: Mbomba (Mbamba) is a deity/serpent from Kongo associated with sea serpent, ocean power. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Fafnir (Norse), Jörmungandr (Norse), Manannán (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Mbomba (Mbamba) is a deity/serpent from Kongo associated with sea serpent, ocean power. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
